amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to reduce the salary of Michael S. Regan, Administrator of the EPA, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 264, 1 Present (Roll no. 381).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 264, 1 Present (Roll no. 381).
